subject: Stanley Cup
Playoff Games
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Devils, on the brink of losing the Stanley Cup finals, got a tie-breaking goal from Adam Henrique with 4 minutes 29 seconds left and went on to beat the Kings.
snippet: The Devils, on the brink of losing the Stanley Cup finals, got a tie-breaking goal from Adam Henrique with 4 minutes 29 seconds left and went on to beat the Kings.
